heading: 2.2.3 Patch is Live!
content: The 2.2.3 Patch for Diablo 4 Season 8 just hit live tonight! Belial is not done with you just yet! Check here to learn everything you need to know! We hope you enjoy the Season of Belial's Return with the aid of our Season 8 compendium update. Our focus for the rest of Season 8 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 8 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
